sp

Class SendingData

  • java.lang.Object
    • sp.SendingData

  • public class SendingData
extends java.lang.Object
    Instance of class SendingData representing sending data packages between selected nodes.
    Author:
    Pavel Prùcha and Tomáš Slíva

      • completeRequests

        public static void completeRequests()

      • completeRequests

        public static void completeRequests(boolean x,
                                    javafx.scene.control.TextArea textArea)
        This method is loading all requests and simulate completing all requests according to time.
        Parameters:
        x - If false print into console, else into GUI.
        textArea - TextArea of GUI.

      • sendData

        public static void sendData(int time,
                            int data,
                            java.util.List<Node> dijkstra,
                            Node stackedNode,
                            Node prime)
        This method is sending data packages through the shortest path to the target node.
        Parameters:
        time - Starting time of request.
        data - Data package.
        dijkstra - Sorted list of all nodes to the target node.
        stackedNode - Node, where is data package saved.
        primeNode - Prime node of default dijkstra.
        firstNode - First node of dijkstra.

      • sendData

        public static void sendData(int time,
                            int data,
                            java.util.List<Node> dijkstra,
                            Node stackedNode,
                            Node prime,
                            boolean x,
                            javafx.scene.control.TextArea textArea)
        This method is sending data packages through the shortest path to the target node.
        Parameters:
        time - Starting time of request.
        data - Data package.
        dijkstra - Sorted list of all nodes to the target node.
        stackedNode - Node, where is data package saved.
        prime - Prime node of default dijkstra.
        x - If false print into console, else into GUI.
        textArea - TextArea of GUI.
        first - First node of dijkstra.

      • writeFaulting

        public static int writeFaulting(boolean x,
                                javafx.scene.control.TextArea textArea)
        This method is writing total sum of faulting.
        Parameters:
        x - If false print into console, else into GUI.
        textArea - TextArea of GUI.
        Returns:
        Total sum of faulting.

      • endOrAgain

        public static void endOrAgain(Node two,
                              Node last,
                              int second,
                              int packageData,
                              Node first,
                              boolean x,
                              javafx.scene.control.TextArea textArea)
        This method is deciding if the request is completed or not. If not, method is founding new request.
        Parameters:
        two - Second node of dijkstra.
        last - Last node of dijkstra.
        second - Starting time of request.
        packageData - Data package.
        first - First node of dijkstra.
        x - If false print into console, else into GUI.
        textArea - TextArea of GUI.

      • deleteStack

        public static void deleteStack(Node stackedNode,
                               int data)
        This method is deleting data from memory stack of selected node.
        Parameters:
        stackedNode - Node, where is data package saved.
        data - Data package.

      • watchNode

        public static void watchNode(java.lang.String text,
                             javafx.scene.control.TextArea textArea)
        This method is watching node of the graph.
        Parameters:
        text - Text from first TextField for removing edge.
        textArea - TextArea of GUI.
